title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 353.6 - Hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 353.6 - Hearing

State Regulations

An applicant may request a hearing and redetermination of any
adverse determination by filing a written request for same as provided by
section
74
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
353.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
